name: The Cube - text adventure game
description:
Title: The Cube

Platform: HTML

Genre: Game

Rating: T

Target Market: Ages 15+

Game overview: The Cube is a short puzzle and text adventure game inspired by the amazing game "Please Don't Touch Anything''. In this game, you play the role of a bomb diffuser, hired to deal with this mysterious device hidden in a room deep underground. Can you solve the simple puzzles and discover the secret of "The Cube," or will you die trying?  Find out by trying it for yourself!

Instructions: Click the Run Game button

Game Design Team

Conner Jenkins -Game Designer
